00031 #define INVALID_FILE "../../parsers/data/test.file.text"
00032 #define CALVIN_FILE "../../parsers/data/ArraySetFile.xml"
00033 #define MAGE_FILE "../../../file/CPPTest/data/sample_and_exp_template.xml"
00034 #define EXP_FILE "../../../file/CPPTest/data/full.EXP"

00047 void FusionArrayFileReaderTest::testCreation()
00048 {
00049         FusionArrayFileReader *reader = new FusionArrayFileReader;
00050         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader != NULL);
00051         delete reader;
00052 }
00053 
00055 void FusionArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_invalid_file()
00056 {
00057         FusionArrayFileReader reader;
00058         ArrayData data;
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(INVALID_FILE, data) == false);
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == "");
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.DataTypeIdentifier() == "");
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 0);
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.UserAttributes().size() == 0);
00064 }
00065 
00067 void FusionArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_missing_file()
00068 {
00069         FusionArrayFileReader reader;
00070         ArrayData data;
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read("no_file", data) == false);
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == "");
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.DataTypeIdentifier() == "");
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 0);
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.UserAttributes().size() == 0);
00076 }

00079 void FusionArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_calvin_array_file()
00080 {
00081         FusionArrayFileReader reader;
00082         ArrayData array;
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(CALVIN_FILE, array) == true);
00084 
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.DataTypeIdentifier() == ARRAY_SET_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER );
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == std::string("432-432-432-432"));
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.CreatedStep() == ArrayRegistrationStep);
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.InitialProject() == L"my_project");
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.CreationDateTime() == L"8/12/2005 9:00AM");
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.CreatedBy() == L"ljevon");
00091 
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 1);
00093 
00094         ArrayAttributes &atts = array.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0];
00095 
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.Identifier() == "123-123-123-123");
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.ArrayName() == "mychip");
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.ArrayBarcode() == "@1234567890");
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.Media() == PlateOrStripMedia);
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MediaRow() == 1);
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MediaCol() == 12);
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MasterFile() == "Test3.master");
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.MasterFileId() == "123-123-123-123");
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.PatAssignment() == AffyBarcodeAssignment);
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.CreationDateTime() == L"8/12/2005 10:00AM");
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.CreatedBy() == L"ljevon");
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.CreatedStep() == ScanningStep);
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( atts.Comment() == L"here is a comment");
00109 
00110         ParameterNameValuePairVector &params = atts.Attributes();
00111         ParameterNameValuePairVector::iterator paramIt = params.begin();
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( params.size() == 2);
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*paramIt).Name == L"SampleID");
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*paramIt).Value == L"433232");
00115         ++paramIt;
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*paramIt).Name == L"LIMS System");
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*paramIt).Value == L"Nautilis");
00118 
00119 
00120         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &userParams = array.UserAttributes();
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( userParams.size() == 6 );
00122 
00123         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator userIt = userParams.begin();
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Species" );
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"Homo Sapien" );
00126         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == true );
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00129         ++userIt;
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Individual" );
00131         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"me" );
00132         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00133         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00135         ++userIt;
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"When" );
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"now" );
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TimeParameterType);
00141         ++userIt;
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"How much" );
00143         const double eps = 1e-5;
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL( (*userIt).GetValueFloat(), 1.0, eps);
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::FloatParameterType);
00148         ++userIt;
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Sex" );
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"" );
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlMultiParameterType);
00153 
00154         std::list<std::wstring>::iterator cit = (*userIt).ControlMultiValues().begin();
00155         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Male" );
00156         ++cit;
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Other" );
00158 
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 4 );
00160         cit = (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().begin();
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Male" );
00162         ++cit;
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Female" );
00164         ++cit;
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Unknown" );
00166         ++cit;
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cit) == L"Other" );
00168         ++userIt;
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Age" );
00170         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"30 something" );
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).RequiredFlag() == false );
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00174         ++userIt;
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (userIt == userParams.end() );
00176 
00177 
00178 }
00179 
00181 void FusionArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_dtt_array_file()
00182 {
00183         FusionArrayFileReader reader;
00184         ArrayData data;
00185         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(MAGE_FILE, data) == true);
00186 
00187         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == std::string(""));
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 1);
00189         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Identifier() == "");
00190         const ParameterNameValuePairVector &arrayParams = data.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes();
00191         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( arrayParams.size() == 1 );
00192         ParameterNameValuePairVector::const_iterator arrayIt = arrayParams.begin();
00193         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayIt).Name == L"Probe Array Type" );
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayIt).Value == L"Test3" );
00195 
00196 
00197         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &userParams = data.UserAttributes();
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( userParams.size() == 33 );
00199         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator userIt = userParams.begin();
00200         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"GCOS Sample Name" );
00201         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"Sample_with_Sample_Template" );
00202         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00203         ++userIt;
00204         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Sample Template Name" );
00205         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"MIAME Sample Information" );
00206         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00207         userIt = userParams.end();
00208         --userIt;
00209         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Grid Alignment Passed" );
00210         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"" );
00211         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00212 }
00213 
00215 void FusionArrayFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_mas_array_file()
00216 {
00217         FusionArrayFileReader reader;
00218         ArrayData data;
00219         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(EXP_FILE, data) == true);
00220 
00221         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == std::string(""));
00222         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 1);
00223         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Identifier() == "");
00224         const ParameterNameValuePairVector &arrayParams = data.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes();
00225         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( arrayParams.size() == 1 );
00226         ParameterNameValuePairVector::const_iterator arrayIt = arrayParams.begin();
00227         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayIt).Name == L"Probe Array Type" );
00228         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayIt).Value == L"Test3" );
00229 
00230         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &userParams = data.UserAttributes();
00231         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( userParams.size() == 8 );
00232         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator userIt = userParams.begin();
00233         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Chip Lot" );
00234         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"123" );
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00236         ++userIt;
00237         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Operator" );
00238         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"ljevon" );
00239         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00240         ++userIt;
00241         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Sample Type" );
00242         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"s_type" );
00243         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00244         ++userIt;
00245         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Description" );
00246         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"Demo data" );
00247         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00248         ++userIt;
00249         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Project" );
00250         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"s_proj" );
00251         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00252         ++userIt;
00253         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Comments" );
00254         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"None" );
00255         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00256         ++userIt;
00257         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Solution Type" );
00258         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"sol type" );
00259         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00260         ++userIt;
00261         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetName() == L"Solution Lot" );
00262         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).GetValueText() == L"123123" );
00263         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00264         ++userIt;
00265 }
